baton.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short thin stick used by a conductor (=the leader of a group of musicians) to direct the music
baton.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a short light stick that is passed from one person to another during a race
baton.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a short thick stick used as a weapon by a police officer
baton.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a short stick that is carried as a sign of a special office or rank
baton.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a light metal stick that is spun and thrown into the air by a majorette
